content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'unified-data-cluster_modineerlake_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [unified-data-cluster_modineerlake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://unified-data-cluster@modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE GloviaProd.CR_CNTDT (
	[SALES_CCN] nvarchar(1000),
	[CNT_NUM] nvarchar(1000),
	[CR_CNTDT_SEQ] nvarchar(1000),
	[REQD_DATE] datetime2(7),
	[REQD_TIME] nvarchar(1000),
	[DOCK] nvarchar(1000),
	[INBOUND_SEQ] nvarchar(1000),
	[REL_QTY_TYPE] nvarchar(1000),
	[CUM_ORDER_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	[DIS_ORDER_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	[QTY_QUAL] nvarchar(1000),
	[PER_QUAL] nvarchar(1000),
	[SHIP_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	[COMMIT_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	[CANC_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	[BO_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	[UNIT_PRICE] numeric(38,18),
	[LAST_PICK_SEQ] numeric(38,18),
	[EST_PARTS_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[EST_TAX_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[SHIP_PARTS_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[SHIP_TAX_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[DEL_ORD_NUM] nvarchar(1000),
	[DEL_DATE] datetime2(7),
	[DEL_TIME] nvarchar(1000),
	[SHIP_VAT_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[PRICE_OVERRIDDEN] nvarchar(1000),
	[NC_REASON] nvarchar(1000),
	[CANC_REASON] nvarchar(1000),
	[BOOK_RATE] numeric(38,18),
	[BOOT_RATE_DIV] nvarchar(1000),
	[LAST_SHIP_SEQ] numeric(38,18),
	[LAST_PROF_INV] nvarchar(1000),
	[LAST_PROF_ASN] nvarchar(1000),
	[EST_BACKLOG_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[SHIP_BACKLOG_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[INBOUND_CNR_ITEM] nvarchar(1000),
	[INBOUND_CNR_REV] nvarchar(1000),
	[CONSIGNED_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	[CONSIGNMENT_LOC] nvarchar(1000),
	[CONSIGNMENT_BIN] nvarchar(1000),
	[USER_ALPHA1] nvarchar(1000),
	[USER_ALPHA2] nvarchar(1000),
	[USER_ALPHA3] nvarchar(1000),
	[USER_NUM1] numeric(38,18),
	[USER_NUM2] numeric(38,18),
	[USER_NUM3] numeric(38,18),
	[USER_DATE] datetime2(7),
	[USER_TIME] nvarchar(1000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'GLOVIA_PROD/CR_CNTDT/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [unified-data-cluster_modineerlake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM GloviaProd.CR_CNTDT
GO
